<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3283</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Using a Learning Object to teach ESL/EFL</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verwenden einer erlernennachricht, um ESL/EFL zu 
unterrichten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Utilisation d'un objet d'étude pour enseigner 
ESL/EFL</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Usando um objeto de aprendizagem ensinar ESL/EFL</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Usando un oggetto imparante per insegnare 
ESL/EFL</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρησιμοποίηση ενός αντικειμένου εκμάθησης για να 
διδάξει το ESL/$l*EFL</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Usar un objeto que aprende para enseñar ESL/EFL</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is A Lesson Plan for Building sentences in ESL/EFL classes by using a learning object, includes student activities and assessment Rubric</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">teaching strategies</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning object</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein Lektion-Plan für 
Gebäudeprogrammsätze in den ESL/EFL Kategorien, indem es eine 
erlernennachricht verwendet, enthält Kursteilnehmeraktivitäten und 
Einschätzung Rubrik</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un plan de leçon pour des phrases de 
bâtiment dans des classes d'ESL/EFL en utilisant un objet d'étude, 
inclut la rubrique d'activités d'étudiant et d'évaluation</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma planta da lição para sentenças do 
edifício em classes de ESL/EFL usando um objeto de aprendizagem, 
inclui o rubric das atividades do estudante e da avaliação</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un programma di lezione per le frasi 
della costruzione nei codici categoria di ESL/EFL usando un oggetto 
imparante, include la rubrica di attività dell'allievo e di 
valutazione</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα σχέδιο μαθήματος για την οικοδόμηση 
των προτάσεων στις κλάσεις ESL/$l*EFL με τη χρησιμοποίηση ενός 
αντικειμένου εκμάθησης, περιλαμβάνει τη ρουμπρίκα δραστηριοτήτων 
σπουδαστών και αξιολόγησης</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es un plan de la lección para las 
sentencias del edificio en clases de ESL/EFL usando un objeto que 
aprende, incluye la rúbrica de las actividades del estudiante y del 
gravamen</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Strategien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erlernennachricht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">stratégies d'enseignement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">objet d'étude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estratégias ensinando</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">objeto de aprendizagem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">strategie d'istruzione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">oggetto imparante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">στρατηγικές διδασκαλίας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αντικείμενο εκμάθησης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Inglés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estrategias de enseñanza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">objeto que aprende</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
